name: Spicy Shredded Chipotle Chicken
description: This Spicy Chipotle Shredded Chicken is perfect for tacos, nachos, quesadillas, salads, and more! Spicy, saucy, and delish.
keywords: shredded chicken, chipotle chicken, spicy chicken
recipeIngredient: 3 individual chipotle peppers in adobo sauce + 1 teaspoon of their sauce
1 cup freshly squeezed orange juice (store bought is fine – I just use my own so there’s no added sugar)
1/2 cup light beer (or replace with 1/2 cup broth)

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the chipotle peppers and garlic cloves. Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the garlic and chipotle; saute for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly to prevent burning. Smells will be yummy.

Add the orange juice, chicken broth, beer, and cilantro and turn the heat to high to bring to a boil. Add the raw chicken breasts; cover and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken breasts are cooked through. Remove the chicken breasts from the pot and place on a cutting board for a few minutes to cool. Shred the chicken with two forks.

Meanwhile, keep the sauce left in the pan over low heat. Whisk in the mustard and cook the sauce until it reduces by about half and you get all that mmm mmm good flavor in a thicker, more concentrated sauce. Add the shredded chicken back to the pot with the sauce and toss to combine. Top with additional fresh cilantro.

recipeYield: 4-6 depending on how you use it

review.reviewBody:
Hola hermosa! Últimamente he descubierto la slow cooker y no me gusta, Me encanta, me subyuga, me fascina ja ja ja ; el sabor de todo se acrecenta y las legumbres tienen textura, en fín, que lo mejor de todo es que la cuenta de luz ha bajado considerablemente. 
Entonces, cuanto tiempo debo tener éste plato de pollo maravilloso, después de hacer toda la preparación, en la slow cooker?. Te agradezco de antemano tu contestación. Cuidaros mucho. Besitos 
P. D. Estoy suscrita hace miles.
Gorgeous!!! Can't wait to make this. Shredded chicken is my favourite...even better than pulled pork!
This looks amazing! I'm on a burrito bowl kick right now and this will be perfect!

This looks so so SO delicious Lindsay! Love the look of this shredded chicken, bet its delicious in a taco or burrito bowl with a TON of avocado!
https://www.youtube.com/addalittlefoof

I love your post, Lindsay. I couldn't agree more with you, I also really enjoy have meal with all my family together, no TV and no cell phones. It is the best part of the day for me.
This recipe looks so DELICIOUS and I love how versatile is this dish. Love it. Pinning ;-)
I love saucy shredded chicken dishes! It is just so darn easy to throw over rice or in a big baked potato for an easy filling meal!

This sounds a lot better than my usual recipe for taco chicken - shredded chicken + jarred taco sauce. On a scale of 1-10, what is the heat level? With 4 kids I have to be careful how hot I make spicy food. 
Love your blog :)
